member.name: MIB_IPADDRTABLE
member.summary: TheMIB_IPADDRTABLE structure contains a table of IPv4 address entries.

member.name: MIB_IPADDRTABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of IPv4 address entries in the table.

member.name: MIB_IPADDRTABLE.table
member.summary: A pointer to a table of IPv4 address entries implemented as an array of structures.
